QuestData.Title: The Threads that Stick
QuestData.Description: Ah, welcome traveler. I have need of your services!$b$bSyra Goldendraft was looking for some silk. Personally I hate silk as it always gets stuck in my fur.$b$bI really want to impress her though.$b$bIf you bring me some silk from the Silkwood to the west of here I will gladly pay you for your help.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you so much! This is perfect!$b$bI hope it didn't stick to you like it stuck to me.$b$bI'm going to go find Syra and give this to her right away!
